explanation: [0-0] A group of animated characters are standing together. The character with red hair is raising his left hand in greeting. On the right side of the frame, the character in the black suit is also raising his left hand. The character with orange hair in the back is also raising his left hand. Next to the character with orange hair is a character with silver hair. The background is a starry night sky.

[0-3] Then the characters wave to the camera, and the scene switches to the characters looking up at the green fireworks and Kongming lanterns blooming in the night sky. Then the scene switches to four animated girls walking out of the palace gate, all holding gifts. Then the scene switches to the character in the black suit floating in the air with a ball of light on his chest, then transforming into a bird, with a banknote floating by underneath. Then the characters run down the stairs.
